root: ^We need to get this inventory out fast. I hope by now you’ve forgotten this concept of ‘free time’ you consistently dream about.
^What wrong with you? Installing a software update?
^Wait, did you forget how to do YOUR JOB? I thought they fixed the CPU bugs for this generation! FINE! So, do you see that pretty blue circle? That’s the shipping lane.
^Press Left Mouse button to use your fire exting- UH, your Propelling Assistant Delivery Device, to fly to the shipping lane. Run into a package to put it in your inventory.
^Finally, press Right Mouse button to throw the package to the recipient.

s: ^Isn’t it unsafe to use equipment for purposes it wasn’t intended for?
^Shouldn’t we be interacting with the recipients to achieve the customer service we strive for?

c-0: ^YOU THINK I DON’T KNOW HOW TO RUN A COMPANY? WHY DON’T YOU PROVE YOU CAN DO YOUR JOB!
c-1: ^YOU THINK I DON’T KNOW HOW TO RUN A COMPANY? WHY DON’T YOU PROVE YOU CAN DO YOUR JOB!
